Steps to reproduce:

While trying to open an email I'll get a"404 page not found".


Actual results:

Sometimes I'll close Mozilla down and reopen and it sometimes works and I can retrieve my email.

comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

While trying to open an email I'll get a"404 page not found".


Actual results:

Sometimes I'll close Mozilla down and reopen and it sometimes works and I can retrieve my email.

It's even worse now. I can't use Yahoo mail in firefox at all now. It is affecting other sites now such as ebay,kim komando and other sites where you have to open a window. I keep getting "404 page can't be found".
comments.author: randybaldauf@yahoo.com
comments.text: It's even worse now. I can't use Yahoo mail in firefox at all now. It is affecting other sites now such as ebay,kim komando and other sites where you have to open a window. I keep getting "404 page can't be found".

comments.text: Randy, have you resolved your issue?  If no one can reproduce, I am going to close this bug.  Thank you.
